attributes.action: Honour (Graeme) Murray Walker OBE with a KBE for services to Motor Racing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: (Graeme) Murray Walker OBE has provided services to Motor Racing since 1948 and is a much loved British Icon. Murray is aged 85 and appears to have been missed off the honours list. We would all like him to be known as Sir (Graeme) Murray Walker as soon as possible.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
